title: 9-11 Lifting the Fog - Session 4 - Highlights and Panel Discussi
description:
Lifting the fog - The scientific Method applied to the 9-11 World Trade Center disaster. A conference held November 11, 2006 on the UC-Berkeley campus, Berkeley CA.

What conclusions can be made about the destruction of the World Trade Center using science, and what are the implications?

Presenters:

    * Steven Jones
    * Jim Hoffman
    * Janette MacKinlay
    * Jenna Orkin
    * Paul Rea

Moderator:

    * Peter Phillips
